name: formattednumbers
description: Displays grey commas as thousand separators

formattedNumbers.throttle.description: The delay in milliseconds before updating decorations. Set to 0 for immediate updates.

formattedNumbers.style.description: The style of the thousand separator.
enumDescriptions: A subtle combining comma below the character.

formattedNumbers.minLength.description: The minimum length of a number to be formatted. Recommended is 5, i.e. starting with 10,000 and keeping years.

formattedNumbers.maxLength.description: The maximum length of a number to be formatted.
